title: Crew Show and the Bentayga
description: Fresh back from /Drive shoots Matt and Zack share what they can about that trip.  Luckily that includes a review of the new Bentley Bentayaga and some quality time in a little car known as the BMW M1.  From there we compare notes on closed-cell memory foam mattresses, rentall car bait-and-switch tactics, how Audi buyers don't care about emissions and the utter shit of Nissan CVTs.  Halfway through Patrick Stevenson of Motor Affair stops by with a painting of Matt's former DeLorean and we dive into the world of BMW.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
